card.name: The Prancing Pony
card.text: Fellowship: Add a burden to play Aragorn from your draw deck.

card.name: ·Bill the Pony
card.text: Bearer must be a Hobbit companion. The Shadow number of each site is -1. Discard Bill the Pony if he is at an underground site during the fellowship or regroup phase.

card.name: Fireworks
card.text: Spell. Fellowship: Spot Gandalf to shuffle up to 2 {Gandalf} or up to 2 {Shire} cards from your discard pile into your draw deck.

card.name: Council Courtyard
card.text: Sanctuary. When the fellowship moves from Council Courtyard, remove {2}.

card.name: ·Horn of Boromir
card.text: Bearer must be Boromir. Maneuver: Exert Boromir and spot an ally. Until the regroup phase, that ally is strength +3 and participates in archery fire and skirmishes.

card.name: Balin's Tomb
card.text: Underground. Maneuver: Discard a tale from play or from hand to heal your companion.

card.name: ·Book of Mazarbul
card.text: Tale. Bearer must be a Dwarf. At the start of each fellowship phase when the fellowship is at site 4 or higher, you may draw a card for each Dwarf companion.

card.name: Galadriel's Glade
card.text: Sanctuary. Fellowship: Exert an Elf to look at an opponent's hand.

card.name: ·Phial of Galadriel
card.text: To play, exert an Elf. Bearer must be the Ring-bearer. Bearer's resistance is +2.

card.name: ·The Balrog, Durin's Bane
card.text: Damage +1. Fierce. While you can spot The Balrog, discard all other minions. Skip the archery phase. Discard The Balrog if not underground.

card.name: ·Saruman, Servant of the Eye
card.text: Saruman may not take wounds during the archery phase and may not be assigned to a skirmish. Assignment: Exert Saruman to assign an {Isengard} minion to a companion (except the Ring-bearer). That companion may exert to prevent this.

card.name: ·Gimli, Son of Glóin
card.text: Damage +1. Skirmish: Exert Gimli to make him strength +2.

card.name: ·Legolas, Greenleaf
card.text: Archer. Archery: Exert Legolas to wound a minion; Legolas does not add to the fellowship archery total.

card.name: ·Aragorn, Ranger of the North
card.text: Ranger. Maneuver: Exert Aragorn to make him defender +1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: ·Legolas, Son of Thranduil
card.text: Archer. While Legolas is at a river or forest, add 1 to the fellowship archery total.

card.name: ·Faramir, Son of Denethor
card.text: Ring-bound. Ranger. An opponent may not play skirmish events or use skirmish special abilities during skirmishes involving Faramir.

card.name: ·Éowyn, Lady of Rohan
card.text: Valiant. Response: If an unbound companion is about to take a wound, exert Éowyn and add {1} to prevent that wound.

card.name: ·Sméagol, Old Noser
card.text: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Regroup: Exert Sméagol (or Gollum) twice to reveal the top 4 cards of your draw deck. Wound a minion for each Shadow card revealed. Place those 4 cards beneath your draw deck in any order.

card.name: ·Théoden, King of the Golden Hall
card.text: Valiant. Maneuver: Play a {Rohan} possession on Théoden to heal a {Rohan} ally.

card.name: Black Rider
card.text: Fierce. This minion is strength +1 for each companion you can spot.

card.name: ·Treebeard, Guardian of the Forest
card.text: Unhasty. Assignment: Exert an unbound Hobbit to allow Treebeard to skirmish. Skirmish: Exert Treebeard to make an Ent damage +1.

card.name: Fell Beast
card.text: To play, discard 2 cards from hand. Bearer must be Nazgûl. Bearer is fierce.

card.name: ·Denethor, Wizened Steward
card.text: Denethor is strength +1 for each other {Gondor} Man you can spot (limit +4).

card.name: ·The Balrog, Terror of Flame and Shadow
card.text: Damage +2. This twilight cost of The Balrog is -3 if you can spot a {Moria} minion. The Balrog cannot be assigned to skirmish companions or allies of strength less than 6.

card.name: ·The Pale Blade
card.text: Bearer must be The Witch-king. He is damage +1. Response: If The Witch-king wins a skirmish, exert him to discard a Free Peoples condition.

card.name: ·Gandalf, Mithrandir
card.text: Damage +1. Each time the fellowship moves, wound Gandalf.

card.name: ·Firefoot
card.text: Bearer must be a {Rohan} Man. If bearer is Éomer, he is defender +1. At the start of each skirmish involving bearer, each minion skirmishing bearer must exert.

card.name: ·Gimli's Helm
card.text: Bearer must be Gimli. He takes no more than 1 wound during each skirmish phase. Skirmish: Discard Gimli's Helm to prevent all wounds to him.

card.name: ·Faramir, Captain of Gondor
card.text: Ring-bound. Ranger. The twilight cost of each other {Gondor} Man in your starting fellowship is -1. While skirmishing a roaming minion, Faramir is strength +2.

card.name: ·Whip of Many Thongs
card.text: Bearer must be The Balrog. Skirmish: Exert The Balrog to discard a helm, shield, or armor borne by a character The Balrog is skirmishing.

card.name: ·The Witch-king, Lord of the Nazgûl
card.text: Twilight. Return to Its Master may not be played. Each time The Witch-king wins a skirmish, you may exert him to wound the Ring-bearer twice.

card.name: ·Gandalf's Staff, Walking Stick
card.text: Bearer must be Gandalf. While you can spot 2 twilight tokens, Gandalf is damage +2.

card.name: ·Éowyn, Sister-daughter of Théoden
card.text: Valiant. Response: If Éowyn is exhausted and about to take a wound in a skirmish, discard 2 cards from hand to prevent that wound.

card.name: ·Axe of Erebor
card.text: Bearer must be Gimli. He is damage +1. Skirmish: Discard a {Dwarven} condition or a card stacked on a {Dwarven} condition to make Gimli strength +1.

card.name: ·Aragorn's Bow
card.text: Bearer must be Aragorn. He is an archer. Archery: Exert Aragorn to wound a minion; Aragorn does not add to the fellowship archery total.

card.name: ·The Balrog's Sword
card.text: Bearer must be The Balrog. It is damage +1. This weapon may be borne in addition to 1 other hand weapon.

card.name: ·Úlairë Nelya, Ringwraith in Twilight
card.text: Twilight. While you can spot 2 burdens or 2 wounds on the Ring-bearer, Úlairë Nelya is fierce and damage +1.

card.name: ·Glamdring, Lightning Brand
card.text: Bearer must be Gandalf. He is damage +1. Each time you play a spell during a skirmish, you may make Gandalf damage +1 until the end of that skirmish.

card.name: ·Éomer, Third Marshal of Riddermark
card.text: While you can spot a {Rohan} Man, Éomer's twilight cost is -1. Éomer is strength +2 for each wound on each minion he is skirmishing.

card.name: ·Gimli, Skilled Defender
card.text: Damage +1. Each time Gimli wins a skirmish, you may wound a minion assigned to skirmish an unbound companion.

card.name: ·Aragorn, Defender of Free Peoples
card.text: Skirmish: Remove an {Elven} token to make a minion skirmishing Aragorn strength -3. Skirmish: Remove a {Dwarven} token to heal a Dwarf. Regroup: If Aragorn is mounted, remove a {Rohan} token to wound a minion twice.

card.name: ·Shelob, Last Child of Ungoliant
card.text: Enduring. Fierce. While in a fierce skirmish, Shelob is damage +1.

card.name: ·Éomer, Keeper of Oaths
card.text: Valiant. When you play Éomer (except in your starting fellowship), you may reveal the top 10 cards of your draw deck and play all {Rohan} possessions revealed. Shuffle your draw deck.

card.name: ·Glorfindel, Revealed in Wrath
card.text: When Glorfindel is in your starting fellowship, his twilight cost is -2. Skirmish: Reveal the top card of your draw deck. You may exert Glorfindel to make a Nazgûl he is skirmishing strength -X, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.

card.name: ·Radagast, The Brown
card.text: The move limit is +1. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, each opponent may discard 2 cards from hand to draw 2 cards.

card.name: ·Goldberry, River-daughter
card.text: Each time the fellowship moves to a river, heal Goldberry and Tom Bombadil. Skirmish: If the fellowship is at a river, exert Goldberry to make a companion strength +1.

card.name: ·Tom Bombadil, The Master
card.text: To play, remove 2 burdens or 2 threats. Skirmish: Spot 2 {Shire} companions and exert Tom Bombadil X times, where X is the fellowship's site number, to cancel a skirmish involving a {Shire} companion.

card.name: ·Sauron, The Lord of the Rings
card.text: Damage +2. Enduring. Fierce. For each burden you spot, threat you spot, and site you control, Sauron's twilight cost is -1.

card.name: Gorgoroth Swarm
card.text: Besieger. When you play this minion, if you can spot another besieger, you may spot 6 companions to play a besieger from your discard pile and control a site.

card.name: ·Ghan-Buri-Ghan, Chieftain of the Woses
card.text: While you can spot 2 other Men, Ghan-buri-Ghan cannot be overwhelmed unless his strength is tripled. While at a forest site, Ghan-buri-Ghan is defender +1.

card.name: ·Radagast's Staff
card.text: Bearer must be Radagast. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, you may draw 2 cards.

card.name: ·Anarion, Lord of Anorien
card.text: Skirmish: Play a {Gondor} skirmish event to make each minion skirmishing Anarion strength -X, where X is Anarion's vitality.

card.name: ·Erkenbrand, Master of Westfold
card.text: If you can spot a {Rohan} Man, you may play Erkenbrand any time you could play a skirmish event. When you play Erkenbrand, you may discard a Shadow possession.

card.name: ·Tom Bombadil's Hat
card.text: To play, spot 2 {Shire} companions. Each time a Shadow card adds a burden or a threat, add a {Shire} token here. Fellowship: Remove 2 {Shire} tokens from here to remove a burden.

card.name: ·The Witch-king, Black Captain
card.text: Enduring. Each Man skirmishing The Witch-king loses all strength bonuses from weapons.

card.name: ·Gimli, Dwarven Delegate
card.text: Damage +1.

card.name: ·Arwen, Maiden of Rivendell
card.text: Ranger. Skirmish: Exert Arwen to make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -2.

card.name: ·Boromir, Steward's Heir
card.text: Knight. Ranger. Ring-bound.

card.name: ·Éomer, Forthwith Banished
card.text: Damage +1. Valiant. While you can spot a {Rohan} Man, Éomer's twilight cost is -1.

card.name: ·Frodo, Mr. Underhill
card.text: Ring-bearer (Resistance 10). The twilight cost of each artifact, possession, and {Shire} tale played on Frodo is -1.

card.name: ·The One Ring, The Binding Ring
card.text: Fellowship: Add 2 burdens to play a ring from your draw deck. Maneuver: Exert bearer to wear The One Ring until the regroup phase. While wearing The One Ring, each time the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound, add a burden instead.

card.name: Nocked
card.text: Exert an Elf who has resistance 4 or more to wound a minion.

card.name: ·Gandalf, Leader of the Company
card.text: While Gandalf is in region 1, each other companion is strength +2. While Gandalf is in region 2, each companion is strength +1. While Gandalf is in region 3, he is strength +2.

card.name: ·Boromir, Hero of Osgiliath
card.text: Knight. Each time Boromir wins a skirmish, you may heal a {Gondor} companion.

card.name: Bow of Minas Tirith
card.text: Bearer must be a {Gondor} Man. At the start of the archery phase, if bearer is at a battleground site, you may exert him or her to make the fellowship archery total +1.

card.name: Armored Easterling
card.text: Skirmish: Remove {2} to make a lurker strength +1. Skirmish: Remove {2} to make a lurker fierce until the regroup phase. Skirmish: Remove {2} to make a lurker damage +1.

card.name: Poleaxe
card.text: Bearer must be a {Men} minion. Skirmish: Remove {2} to make a {Men} minion fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Champion Orc
card.text: Toil 2. (For each {Orc} character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.)

card.name: Spurred to Battle
card.text: To play, exert an {Orc} minion. At the start of the Shadow phase, add {1}.

card.name: ·Riders of the Mark
card.text: To play, spot 2 {Rohan} companions. You may play Riders of the Mark any time you could play a skirmish event. When you play Riders of the Mark, you may exhaust a minion.

card.name: ·Sam, Steadfast Friend
card.text: Ring-bound. Each other companion is resistance +1.

card.name: ·Arwen, Staunch Defender
card.text: Each minion skirmishing Arwen is strength -1 for each forest site on the adventure path.

card.name: ·Éomer, Eored Leader
card.text: While you can spot a {Rohan} Man, Éomer's twilight cost is -1. Maneuver: If you can spot more minions than companions, exert Éomer to play a {Rohan} companion from your draw deck.

card.name: ·Úlairë Toldëa, Black Shadow
card.text: Fierce. When you play Úlairë Toldëa, you may exert him to take a {Ringwraith} event from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: ·The Witch-king's Beast, Fell Creature
card.text: Bearer must be a Nazgûl. If bearer is The Witch-king, after all skirmishes and fierce skirmishes have been resolved, you may exert him twice to make him participate in one additional assignment and skirmish phase.

card.name: ·Úlairë Attëa, Second of the Nine Riders
card.text: Fierce. Each time Úlairë Attëa is assigned to a fierce skirmish involving a character who has resistance 4 or less, you may exert Úlairë Attëa to add a burden.

card.name: ·Sting, Weapon of Heritage
card.text: Bearer must be Bilbo, Frodo, or Sam. Maneuver: If bearer is Bilbo or Frodo, exert him to make another companion resistance +2 until the regroup phase. If bearer is Sam, each time he wins a skirmish, you may remove a burden.

card.name: Olog-Hai Bestial
card.text: Degats +1. Acharne. Pour jouer, designez un seide {Orc}. Affectation : Affaiblissez ce seide pour l'affecter a un compagnon qui detient un artefact. Le joueur des Peuples Libres peut defausser un artefact en jeu pour prevenir ceci.

card.name: ·Pippin, Brave Decoy
card.text: Skirmish: If Pippin is not assigned to a skirmish, spot an unbound companion who has less resistance than Pippin to have Pippin replace him or her in a skirmish.

card.name: ·Legolas, Companion of the Ring
card.text: While Legolas is at a battleground or forest site, he is strength +2 and resistance +2.

card.name: ·Éowyn, Shieldmaiden of Rohan
card.text: Each time Éowyn wins a skirmish, each other {Rohan} Man is strength +1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: ·Jarnsmid, Barding Emissary
card.text: At the start of each skirmish involving Jarnsmid, you may remove a burden (or 2 burdens if you can spot another {Gandalf} companion).

card.name: Vapour and Steam
card.text: Skirmish: Exert your {Gandalf} companion and add a burden to make that companion damage +1.

card.name: Massing Strength
card.text: Discard any number of your {Orc} minions from play to make an {Orc} minion strength +3 for each one discarded.

card.name: Morgul Tormentor
card.text: Each time the Free Peoples player assigns this minion to skirmish an unwounded companion, he or she must add a burden or discard a card from hand.

card.name: ·Farmer Maggot, Hobbit of the Marish
card.text: While Farmer Maggot is at a dwelling or forest site, he is strength +4.

card.name: ·Mithril-coat, Dwarf-mail
card.text: Bearer must be a Ring-bound Hobbit. Each minion skirmishing bearer loses all damage bonuses. Skirmish: Exert bearer to make each minion he is skirmishing lose fierce and unable to gain fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: ·Saruman, Agent of the Dark Lord
card.text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Skirmish: Exert Saruman to make an {Uruk-hai} minion strength +2. Each time a companion is killed, you may heal Saruman.

card.name: Keening Wail
card.text: Toil 2. (For each {Ringwraith} character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Spot a Nazgûl to add a burden.

card.name: ·Úlairë Nelya, Third of the Nine Riders
card.text: Fierce. Shadow: Exert Úlairë Nelya to replace the fellowship's current site with a site from your adventure deck.

card.name: ·Úlairë Lemenya, Black Enemy
card.text: When you play Úlairë Lemenya, you may play a {Ringwraith} mount from your discard pile.

card.name: ·Úlairë Nelya, Black Hunter
card.text: Fierce. Each time Úlairë Nelya wins a skirmish, you may draw a card.

card.name: ·The Mouth of Sauron, Messenger of Mordor
card.text: Maneuver: Exert The Mouth of Sauron to play a {Men} condition or {Men} possession from your draw deck.

card.name: ·Orophin, Brother of Haldir
card.text: While Orophin is at a forest site and you can spot another Elf, Orophin is an archer.

card.name: ·Grima, Footman of Saruman
card.text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Each time a Free Peoples character is killed, you may spot another {Men} minion to exert each companion.

card.name: ·Úlairë Otsëa, Zwarte Schim
card.text: Shadow: Exert Úlairë Otsëa and discard a {Ringwraith} condition from hand to discard a Free Peoples condition from play.

card.name: ·Saruman, of Many Colours
card.text: Damage +1. Fierce. Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) When you play Saruman, name a culture. Each companion of the named culture is strength -1.

card.name: ·Úlairë Otsëa, Seventh of the Nine Riders
card.text: When you play Úlairë Otsëa, you may spot a companion who has X wounds to reveal the top X cards of your draw deck. Take each {Ringwraith} card revealed this way into hand.

card.name: ·Hama, Captain of the King's Guard
card.text: Hama is strength +1 for each Shadow possession you can spot. Each time Hama wins a skirmish, you may discard a possession from play.

card.name: Guard of the White Tree
card.text: Knight. Skirmish: Discard a {Gondor} condition from your support area to make this companion strength +2.

card.name: ·The Witch-king, Captain of the Nine Riders
card.text: Fierce. Toil 2. (For each {Ringwraith} character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.)

card.name: ·Úlairë Attëa, Second of the Nine Riders
card.text: Fierce. Each time Úlairë Attëa is assigned to a fierce skirmish involving a character who has resistance 4 or less, you may exert Úlairë Attëa to add a burden.

card.name: ·Úlairë Nelya, Third of the Nine Riders
card.text: Fierce. Shadow: Exert Úlairë Nelya to replace the fellowship's current site with a site from your adventure deck.

card.name: ·Úlairë Cantëa, Fourth of the Nine Riders
card.text: While Úlairë Cantëa is at a forest or dwelling site, he is strength +2 and fierce.

card.name: ·Úlairë Lemenya, Fifth of the Nine Riders
card.text: Each character skirmishing Úlairë Lemenya who has resistance 5 or less is strength -3.

card.name: ·Úlairë Enquëa, Sixth of the Nine Riders
card.text: Fierce. When you play Úlairë Enquëa, if you can spot 2 other Nazgûl, you may exert 2 unbound companions (or exert each companion if you can spot 6 companions).

card.name: ·Úlairë Otsëa, Seventh of the Nine Riders
card.text: When you play Úlairë Otsëa, you may spot a companion who has X wounds to reveal the top X cards of your draw deck. Take each {Ringwraith} card revealed this way into hand.

card.name: ·Úlairë Toldëa, Eighth of the Nine Riders
card.text: Fierce. Each time Úlairë Toldëa wins a skirmish, you may play the fellowship's next site.

card.name: ·Úlairë Nertëa, Ninth of the Nine Riders
card.text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) While Úlairë Nertëa is at a forest site, he is strength +2. While you can spot 6 companions, each Nazgûl is strength +2.

card.name: ·Faramir, Prince of Ithilien
card.text: While you can spot Boromir, Faramir is twilight cost -1. While you can spot Denethor, Faramir is twilight cost -1. While Faramir bears a {Gondor} possession, he is defender +1.

card.name: ·Éowyn, Restless Warrior
card.text: Each possession you play on Éowyn during the fellowship phase is twilight cost -1. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, you may reinforce a {Rohan} token (or reinforce 2 {Rohan} tokens if you can spot Éomer or Théoden).

card.name: ·Isildur, Heir of Elendil
card.text: Knight. Isildur is resistance +1 for each card in your hand. At the end of any phase, if Isildur has resistance 0, place him in your dead pile. Each time you reconcile, you may draw a card.

card.name: Isengard Marauder
card.text: To play, discard 3 cards from your hand. While you can spot 2 other {Orc} minions, this minion is fierce.

card.name: Covetous Uruk
card.text: Damage +1. This minion is strength +1 for each possession you spot.

card.name: ·Haldir, Sentry of the Golden Wood
card.text: To play, spot an Elf. While the fellowship is at a battleground site, Haldir is strength +2. While the fellowship is at a forest site, Haldir is an archer.

card.name: ·Gimli, Eager Hunter
card.text: Damage +1. Hunter 3. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +3.)

card.name: ·Legolas, Fleet-footed Hunter
card.text: Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Regroup: Exert 2 hunter companions to draw a card.

card.name: ·Aragorn, Swift Hunter
card.text: Ranger. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Skirmish: Exert Aragorn to make a hunter companion strength +1.

card.name: ·Lurtz, Now Perfected
card.text: Damage +1. Each time Lurtz wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player must exert X companions, where X is the current region number.

card.name: ·Aragorn, Defender of Rohan
card.text: Valiant. While the Ringbearer is assigned to a skirmish, each {Rohan} companion gains hunter 1.

card.name: Primitive Brand
card.text: Bearer must be a {Men} minion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish you may transfer this possession to another {Men} minion. If you do, stack a {Men} minion from play on a {Men} possession in your support area.

card.name: ·Watcher at Sarn Ford, Ranger of the North
card.text: Ranger. Skirmish: Exert a {Gondor} Man with a resistance 6 or more to make that Man strength +3.
